extendedInfo.description: This free app turns your phone into a pedometer.Features- Step count & distance estimate (miles or km)- Adjustable sensitivity- Over 85% accuracy in treadmill tests- Works in backgrnd or when screen locked, BUT NOT WHILE PHONE ASLEEPFULL VERSION availableIf you only need distance tracking, try Google My Tracks.

reviews.comment: I am looking for an app to tell me how many miles I walk. That doesn\'t take a lot of battery and is free. I guess this app don\'t do that. But good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This counts steps better than others but it uses so much of the battery. U can\'t see how many steps u have taken cause u have to stop and charge it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent interface. Sensitivity needs work. It was either too sensitive,recording hand movements as steps, or not sensitive enough.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: At first I really didn\'t think it worked.  After looking at the options again I realize that you have to place a figure in the \"Distance per Step\" option box.  Once I did that (in feet), it worked perfectly.  Now I walk everyday with my app to track my distance.  Its pretty accurate for the most part with my Google Now.  I love it.  We had our whole walking team at the job download and configure the app.  Great job Dev Team. I highly recommend this app. Its very easy and straight forward to use.
reviews.author: Don Campbell

reviews.comment: Works pretty good and can\'t beat the price
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: MyTouch.Works nicely.Still getting sensitivity set right;the make noise/vibrate feature is nice to ensure accuracy.Needs \"ongoing\" notification for 5*
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Lame app...walked all over costco and it recorded 17 steps
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t count your steps correctly...good concept and set up, just wish it worked
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sometimes accurate, sometimes not. Have to count my own steps, then stop & see if its working right. Defeats the purpose. Wish it worked. Good idea.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Tried using this (instead of the other Pedometer which is no longer free), but doesn\'t seem to work very well. Uninstalling. Pity.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good idea but tracks too many steps for real ones.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: GREAT APP! Glad that its a solid working program & w/that I can over look that is basic!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Lost patience trying to get this to work. Uninstall
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: if you are using this with droid, keep the sensitivity low to ensure accuracy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I uninstalled right away. Adjusted everything and still wouldnt work. Poop!

reviews.comment: nice way to discharge your cell phone in 4 hours.

reviews.comment: Love it! Decided to upgrade to the full version for the log.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does not count steps but does count how many times you swing your arms.

reviews.comment: Good app, but needs more peanut butter

reviews.comment: Nice. Just be carefull to adjust the sensibility of app. Bye.
